name: BMI Calculator
description: This was me first dipping my toes into the ocean of Javascript. It ain't pretty but it works!

name: Address Book
description: A simple address book that stores the information in your computer's local storage. Loads of JavaScript and a touch of Tailwind CSS styling.

name: FizzBuzz
description: I would prefer a weekend with GinFizz over a weekend with FizzBuzz to be totally honest with you but, all things considered, I think it turned out alright! JavaScript and Tailwind, shaken not stirred.
